event_data.continuation_prompt:
The end-to-end integration test suite for af_engine is COMPLETE with 309 passing tests and 102 regression markers. No additional cycles are needed. The test suite successfully validates:

1. Full mission lifecycle (PLANNING -> COMPLETE)
2. Iteration counter behavior (stays at 0 on success, increments on revision)
3. Stage transitions in correct order
4. Tool permissions enforced via InitGuard
5. Claude timeout with MAX_CLAUDE_RETRIES
6. needs_revision returns to BUILDING
7. needs_replanning returns to PLANNING
8. cycle_budget respected
9. Continuation prompts generated
10. Mission completes when budget exhausted

If additional work is desired in the next cycle, consider:
- Adding performance benchmarks for test execution time
- Adding code coverage analysis integration
- Creating CI/CD workflow file for GitHub Actions
- Adding mutation testing to verify test quality

All core mission objectives have been achieved. The test suite is production-ready.

cycle_report.summary: Completed comprehensive end-to-end integration test suite for modular af_engine. All 309 tests pass with 102 regression-marked tests for preventing bug reintroduction. Test suite covers full mission lifecycle, iteration counter behavior, stage transitions, tool permission enforcement, failure scenarios, and multi-cycle budget handling.
achievements: 102 regression tests selectable with pytest -m regression
Full lifecycle tests: PLANNING -> BUILDING -> TESTING -> ANALYZING -> CYCLE_END -> COMPLETE
Iteration counter tests verify stays at 0 on success, increments on revision/replanning
Stage transition tests validate correct order enforcement
Tool permission tests via InitGuard enforcement (40 tests)
Multi-cycle budget tests for cycle_budget, continuation prompts (19 tests)
Real Claude API smoke tests (skipped by default, runnable with pytest -m real_claude)
Parallel test execution verified with pytest -n auto
issues: No critical issues encountered - test suite is complete and functional
